Package mph.beans.sessions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdministratorManagerRemote
    Remote interface which contains methods available to the system administrator.
    It extends UserRegisteringFunctionalities.
    ArtifactEditingFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to upload artifacts.
    It extends UserEditingFunctionalities.
    ArtifactEvaluatorFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to evaluate the artifacts registered into the MPH system.
    It extends UserEditingFunctionalities.
    ArtifactViewerFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to get information about artifacts and to download them.
    It extends UserEditingFunctionalities.
    BasicUserManagerInterface
    This interface will be implemented by the user interfaces to provide the basic user functionalities such as viewing.
    It extends UserSessionInterface, CourseViewerFunctionalities, ProjectViewerFunctionalities, DeliverableViewerFunctionalities, ArtifactViewerFunctionalities, TeamViewerFunctionalities.
    CourseViewerFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to get information about courses.
    DeliverableViewerFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to get information about project deliverables.
    ProfessorManagerRemote
    This remote interface will be implemented by the ProfessorManager classes in the server and client.
    It provides the methods available to professors.

    It extends BasicUserManagerInterface, ProjectEditingFunctionalities, ArtifactEvaluatorFunctionalities.
    ProjectEditingFunctionalities
    This interface provide methods to publish a new project into the MPH system.
    ProjectViewerFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to get information about projects.
    StudentManagerRemote
    This remote interface will be implemented by the StudentManager classes in the server and client.
    It provides the methods available to students.

    It extends BasicUserManagerInterface, UserRegisteringFunctionalities, ArtifactEditingFunctionalities, TeamManagementFunctionalities, TeamCreationFunctionalities, TeamBasicFunctionalities.
    TeamBasicFunctionalities
    This interface provides basic methods for the user to interact with a project team.
    TeamCreationFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to create a new project team into the MPH system.
    TeamManagementFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to manage a project team.
    TeamViewerFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to get information about project teams.
    UserEditingFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to update the data of a user.
    UserLoginFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods which allow the MPH users to log in or log out from the system
    UserRegisteringFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods for the users to register to the MPH system.
    UserSessionInterface
    This interface provides methods to manipulate users.
    It extends UserLoginFunctionalities, UserLoginFunctionalities, UserEditingFunctionalities.
    UserViewerFunctionalities
    This interface provides method to get information about the users registered into the MPH system.
